data.title: MICHELIN METRO
data.meta_description: MICHELINÂ® Metro Tires provides tires for both rail transport manufacturers and urban transport network operators around the world
data.text:
FROM 1951 TO THE PRESENT DAY, A QUICK LOOK AT OUR KEY FIGURES, CLIENTS AND ACHIEVEMENTS

The first tire ever to be fitted on a metro was on the line 11 of the RATP in Paris, in 1951. Since then, Michelin has developed this technical solution for various types of metro (heavy, light, monorail) in over 60 urban transportation networks throughout more than 20 countries all over the world.

We are proud to be trusted by highly regarded rail transport manufacturers such as Alstom, Siemens, Bombardier, etc. for the original equipment of their metros... as much as we strive to serve transport network operators around the globe with high levels of satisfaction.

Learn more
